subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: As owners prepared to vote for Bud Selig’s successor, the front-runner, Rob Manfred, faced a challenge from Tom Werner, a Red Sox co-owner who ran the Padres in the 1990s.
snippet: As owners prepared to vote for Bud Selig’s successor, the front-runner, Rob Manfred, faced a challenge from Tom Werner, a Red Sox co-owner who ran the Padres in the 1990s.
